title: Has Congress approved the 22nd Amendment "to ensure that the Rwandan Armed Forces are not re-elected"?
subtitle: The critics seized remarks made by the Democratic Representative of the United States of America, Alexandria Okasio-Courtis, during their appearance before the Department of National Security in March 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The United States Congress approved the 22nd Amendment to ensure that President Franklin de Roosevelt was not re-elected.
